page.title: 02FARMING.
page.content: Mr.Beech gets up at 6.00am and has his {breakfast}of cereal ,bacon ,eggs and a cup of tea. The first job on the farm is milking and for this machines are used and about 300 pints of milk per day are produced. After the milking they take the cows back to the fields to be fed. In winter the cows remain in the cow shed and are fed with{hay {and silage. } After lunch work on the farm involves hay making, silage making, sheep shearing and dipping, depending on the time of year.His last task is to milk the cows.At 6.00pm Mr. Beech has his evening meal.To{relax}he watches television.Mr.Beech likes programmes about history and documentaries.When he gets the time he takes his wife to the theatre.He tells us that he likes his work and life on the farm.
